author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
As many as 484 organisers and 463 cooks are to be recruited for school noon meal programme in Tiruvannamalai district.

According to a release from district collector A. Gnanasekaran, communal roaster, government norms and court directions would be adhered in the direct recruitment.

On or before Feb. 5

Interested women candidates whose age is between 21 and 40 may submit their applications with concerned blocks/ municipal offices on or before February 5.

For the candidates belonging to Scheduled Tribe communities even those completed 18 years of age are eligible to be recruited.

Educational qualification: for the post of noon meal organizer people who passed SSLC shall apply. For ST candidates, a pass/fail in class VIII is enough.

For the post of cooks fifth pass is enough and for ST candidates just literacy is enough.
title: Noon meal organisers, cooks to be recruited
